definition: red root gromwell (Lithospermum erythrorhizon)/flowering plant whose roots provide purple dye/arnebia (plant genus in family Boraginaceae)

sentences.english: The fungal elicitor changed slightly the relative content of each of the shikonin derivatives.

sentences.english: Fatty acids were isolated from Arnebia euchroma for the first time and fatty acid lactones have been firstly isolated from Boraginaceae plants.

sentences.english: Lithospermum has been widely used in clinic for a long time.
